Package cycling

Class Race

java.lang.Object
cycling.Race
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Race extends Object implements Serializable
Race class. This class manages all the races within CyclingPortal and stores all the rider's participating in the race as well as all the stages that are in the race.
See Also:

    • atomicReset

      public static void atomicReset()
      Method that resets the ID counter. The ID counter creates a new ID for every single new rider that is created.
